Docs.typeparam: One of the entity types in this relationship.
One of the entity types in this relationship.

summary.para: Provides a simple API for configuring a many-to-many relationship.
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the API and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.

Docs.remarks: See Modeling entity types and relationships for more information.
